document_data.name: Kordan
document_data.mainbody: '''Kordan''' was a powerful [[wizard]] and an infamous [[archmage]] who was hired by [[Amun-Re]] to build the [[Maze of Mists]] within the [[Pyramid of Amun-Re]], sometime before the 4{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Amun-Re-time}}
document_data.History:
Kordan's creation was located on the second floor of the Pyramid of Amun-Re. The archmage filled the maze with monsters and disorienting mists.

As of the {{YearlinkName|1356}}, the [[doppleganger]]s in the [[Pyramid of Amun-Re]] counted wizards that came to the pyramid to discover the secrets of Kordan the Archmage amongst its disguises. Those disguises were based on the forms of previous victims.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|49}} He may have been the namesake of Kordan's Master Mists{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|48}}
